profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.8 XMP Extension Schemas - PDF/A Schema Description Schema
profile.description: A PDF/A Schema Description Schema namespace prefix is required to be "pdfaSchema".
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A PDF/A Schema Description Schema namespace prefix is required to be "pdfaSchema".

error.message: A PDF/A Schema Description Schema namespace prefix is not "pdfaSchema".
